attributes.action: Not to support within Europe Tony Blair as President of the the EU if the treaty is ratified
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair has lost the confidence of the British people and he is unfit to be the first President of Europe.  We urge Gordon Brown not to canvas other European Leaders to support the election of Blair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
